content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?

content: I had the conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?

content: [Answer] I did not agree on a final price because I believed we could still get a higher price for the apartment, considering its prime location and new construction.

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 5.

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended because the conversation remained respectful and professional throughout.
